headline: Should You Forget Philip Morris International and Buy This Unstoppable Growth Stock Instead?
summary: Philip Morris International is doing an excellent job of transitioning away from its reliance on cigarettes.  The company has an above-average yield for consumer staples stocks of 3.2%.  An alternative consumer staples giant has an even higher yield of 4% and is also a Dividend King.

headline: Turnarounds In Progress: 2 Stocks Where Patient, Riskier Investors Could See Potential Significant Upside

headline: Priced For Perfection
summary: The S&P 500 is now trading at 21x the projected earnings growth rate of 9% in 2025. That is an extremely rich multiple on a very optimistic earnings growth rate.
